items.sentence: I hate it when I work late and end up missing an episode of a show I'm following.
Tom is an old man who always has beautiful young women around him who admire him.
Tom's parents are worried sick about him and just want to know that he's alright.
If I hadn't already bought this bicycle, I would've bought your old one from you.
Tom broke up with Mary before her birthday so he wouldn't have to buy her a gift.
